No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, safety_notes, url"}]

Use authentic insider phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling).","Tone":"upbeat, practical, authoritative.","Official venue link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-chicago/","Constraints":null,"Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/section_profile_example.json","Minimum required JSON fields":"section_uid, section_type, section_title, section_overview, section_keywords, section_cta_text, section_img, section_img_alt, section_link, section_meta_description, section_open_graph_title, section_open_graph_description, section_search_title, section_search_description, section_spotlight"}]
data-section:
{
  "section_uid": "hll-venue-sec",
  "section_type": "section_profile",
  "section_title": "HITS Chicago — Venue Profile (IL)",
  "section_overview": "Chicago-area summer showing with a tight, efficient footprint. Rings and warm-up sit close together, so you can stage two trips out and still make a quick dash through vendor row for studs or spur straps. School early: the warm-up rides best right after a drag; build your last oxer, check your distance off the quarter line, then head to the in-gate with time to breathe. Jog strip is clearly posted—arrive tacked and tidy with numbers visible and a forward trot. Stabling rows are organized with direct lines to schooling; keep fans secured, trunks flush, and ring bags stocked (stud kit, alcohol spritz, towel). Footing is modern all-weather and settles nicely once it packs; expect regular drags and water, especially on derby and GP days. Midwest weather can flip fast—humid mornings, pop-up showers, and bugs at dusk—so layer up, pack fly spray, and protect leather. Central Time (CT) means early classes feel earlier; sync alarms and in-gate texts so you’re never scrambling between hunter cards and the GP ring.",
  "section_keywords": [
    "HITS Chicago",
    "Lamplight",
    "Illinois horse shows",
    "hunter jumper",
    "equitation",
    "Grand Prix",
    "warm-up ring",
    "jog strip",
    "vendor row",
    "stabling",
    "A-circuit",
    "all-weather footing"
  ],
  "section_cta_text": "Plan your HITS Chicago week like a pro",
  "section_img": "https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-chicago/",
  "section_img_alt": "Show rings, warm-up, and stabling at HITS Chicago in Illinois",
  "section_link": "https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-chicago/",
  "section_meta_description": "Insider venue profile for HITS Chicago: warm-up strategy, jog strip tips, vendor row essentials, stabling flow, footing notes, and ring-to-ring tactics for A-circuit hunters, eq, and jumpers.",
  "section_open_graph_title": "HITS Chicago — Venue Guide for A-Circuit Riders",
  "section_open_graph_description": "Authoritative notes on ring flow, warm-ups, jog strip, vendor row, stabling logistics, and footing so your team stays efficient all week in Illinois.",
  "section_search_title": "HITS Chicago Venue Profile — Illinois",
  "section_search_description": "Practical, rider-focused overview of HITS Chicago: schooling cadence, jog strip, vendor row, stabling setup, footing, and show-day logistics for hunters, eq, and jumpers.",
  "section_spotlight": {
    "title": "Quick Hits for HITS Chicago",
    "bullets": [
      "Warm-up cadence: best reads right after a drag—finish on your last oxer.",
      "In-gate rhythm: be staged two trips out; confirm order and heights via text.",
      "Jog strip kit: towel, hoof oil, alcohol spritz; numbers clean and visible.",
      "Stabling ops: fans secured, trunks tight, ring bag stocked (stud key, gloves).",
      "Vendor row timing: go between drags—not at last call—for quick fixes.",
      "Footing feel: improves as it packs; set canter off the quarter line early.",
      "Weather swing: pack layers, rain shell, and fly spray for dusk classes.",
      "Derby/GP days: schooling fills 60–90 min pre-card—school earlier to breathe.",
      "Parking & wheels: carts help, but a smart loop (stabling → warm-up → ring) saves steps.",
      "Team roles: assign a tack runner and a ring runner to keep scratches off the board."
    ]
  }
}

TASK: Curate venue links for [{"venue_official_name":"Lamplight Equestrian Center","state_uid":["recus6ag8poKRYYRB"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-chicago/","city_uid":["rec5Bp5Rf4hruSevd"],"placeId":"Eik2Tjk0MCBEdW5oYW0gUmQgIzJjLCBXYXluZSwgSUwgNjAxODQsIFVTQSIeGhwKFgoUChIJaa45cpMDD4gRgg0Q3__gfzISAjJj","formatted_addressv3":"6N940 Dunham Rd, Wayne, IL 60184","venue_recordId":"rec5C07mBj2DtbaiP"}] (venue_uid=[{"venue_official_name":"Lamplight Equestrian Center","state_uid":["recus6ag8poKRYYRB"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.hitsshows.com/hits-venues/hits-chicago/","city_uid":["rec5Bp5Rf4hruSevd"],"placeId":"Eik2Tjk0MCBEdW5oYW0gUmQgIzJjLCBXYXluZSwgSUwgNjAxODQsIFVTQSIeGhwKFgoUChIJaa45cpMDD4gRgg0Q3__gfzISAjJj","formatted_addressv3":"6N940 Dunham Rd, Wayne, IL 60184","venue_recordId":"rec5C07mBj2DtbaiP"}]), Lamplight Equestrian Center represents an Equestrian Venue located near , Location: 6N940 Dunham Rd, Wayne, IL 60184, GEO context: lat=41.9720716, lon=-88.26751229999999 placeid=Eik2Tjk0MCBEdW5oYW0gUmQgIzJjLCBXYXluZSwgSUwgNjAxODQsIFVTQSIeGhwKFgoUChIJaa45cpMDD4gRgg0Q3__gfzISAjJj., ### Venue Link Field Definitions - venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.
Reference schema: https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/venue-link-curator_example_v2.json, Minimum required JSON fields per link:
venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes
